item.title: about
item.description: abstract we are a group of LGBTQIA+ pals (and an ally or two) who get together weekly over isc.ro. join us to join us, hit up our discord server. events online matches + occasional in-person meet ups. schedule we are in the process of holding a coop-wide poll on the best times for weekly match scheduling. broadly speaking, the current concept is to schedule a block of time during which matches will be held concurrently, and then a block of time afterwards for debrief and community catch up.

item.title: links
item.description: internet scrabble club where our matches are hosted. isc.ro tournament word list the dictionary used in our matches. this link has the dictionary available in multiple formats; you may need to create an account to proceed. TWL
